message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.CG, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with surface reconstruction from point clouds, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. The use of an energy functional and convex relaxation scheme suggests that the paper may belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) or graphics (cs.GR) sub-categories. The paper also deals with geometric quantities and uniform grids, which are common in computational geometry (cs.CG). The use of laser scanners suggests that the paper may also belong to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Finally, the use of optimization techniques suggests that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
